channel.title: Head-to-Head Battle of the Coding Fonts
channel.description:
So I don't think this did the best job of representing Inconsolata (the choice for the ReplPad), but it lets you pit monospace fonts against each other to find the one you like:
https://www.codingfont.com/
I still think if the right weight of Inconsolata is chosen it's the best.
https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Inconsolata?preview.text=0O1Iil&preview.text_type=custom#styles
For me, the competition would be Source Code Pro or Fira Code.
